author: jstrachan
msg: Added support for explicitly setting the clientID of a JMS connection in the XML configuration file.

author: jstrachan
msg: added a warning if a non-XA Messenger is used inside an XA transaction

author: jstrachan
msg: Patch to support the setting of acknowledgement mode via an acknowledge="auto|client|dups OK" attribute
This should fix the issue that amit shetty has found.

author: jstrachan
msg: fixed schoolboy error on the stop watch MessageListener which now prints accurate results since double precision arithmetic is used to avoid rounding errors

author: jstrachan
msg: Fixed an XA schoolboy error; the delist() should be called prior to a commit() or rollback(). DOH!
